Among other interesting Time Series talks, a dedicated session on "New Developments in Seasonal Adjustment", chaired by Robert Kirchner took place in the Hague. JDemetra+ was of sourse showcased as a key tool. Speakers: Daniel Ollech and Karsten Webel, Carlos Saez Calvo, Alessandro Piovanni among others...
Full details [here](https://www.isi-next.org/proposals/proposal/964/detail/)
